fixes.name: Deposit amount
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau calculated field IF [TransactionType] = "Deposit" THEN [Amount] END into a Power BI calculated column. Replaced Tableau IF ... THEN ... END with DAX IF(condition, value, BLANK()) and transformed column references to 'accounts+'[Column].

fixes.name: Withdrawal Amount
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau calculated field IF [TransactionType] = "Withdrawal" THEN [Amount] END into a Power BI calculated column. Replaced Tableau IF ... THEN ... END with DAX IF(condition, value, BLANK()) and transformed column references to 'accounts+'[Column].

fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau aggregation SUM([Deposit amount]) - SUM([Withdrawal Amount]) into DAX. Uses SUM over the calculated columns created above ('accounts+'[Deposit amount] and 'accounts+'[Withdrawal Amount]) and subtracts them to produce the Net Flow measure.
